# PAsync
PAsync

## Examples

```js
var PAsync = require('pasync');

var async = new PAsync();
async.sequence([
    function(callback) {
        console.log('first job');
        callback(null, 'second');
    },
    function(arg1, callback) {
        console.log(arg1 + ' job');
        setTimeout(function() {
            callback(null, 'third');
        }, 1000);
    },
    function(arg1, callback) {
        console.log(arg2 + ' job');
        callback(null, 'done');
    }
], function(err, result) {
    console.log("result: " + result);
});
```
